full_summary:
**Solicitation Notice**
===============

* **Title:** Backscatter X-Ray Kit Procurement
* **Reference Number:** cb-7568-94535354
* **Solicitation Number:** W6399-22LH78/A
* **Publication Date:** 2023-07-27
* **Closing Date:** 2023-09-27T14:00:00

**Solicitation Details**
-------------------

The Department of National Defence is soliciting bids for the procurement of Backscatter X-Ray Kits, including training and product support. The Goods and Services Identification Number (GSIN) associated with this solicitation is N6665.

The procurement will consist of an initial purchase of ten (10) Backscatter X-Ray Kits, with the option to acquire an additional twenty-five (25) kits. Suppliers are required to submit their bids in accordance with the request for proposal (RFP), which is available on the Canada Buys website.

**Request for Proposal (RFP) Amendments**
-----------------------------------

The following RFP amendments are included:

* **RFP AMD001:** Addressed bidder questions and amended the RFP.
* **RFP AMD002:** Addressed bidder questions and amended the RFP.
* **RFP AMD003:** Addressed bidder questions.
* **RFP AMD004:** Addressed bidder questions and amended the RFP.

These amendments aim to clarify and address questions raised by potential bidders. Suppliers are advised to refer to the respective amendment documents for further details.

**Selection Criteria**
-------------------

The selection of the successful bidder will be based on a highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

**Bidding Requirements**
----------------------

Suppliers must meet the reliability status requirement before accessing secure sites associated with this solicitation. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. For further information, please contact Adam Cheung, DLP 8-1-1 at Adam.Cheung@forces.gc.ca or 613-945-2730.

**Commercial Considerations**
---------------------------

The National Security Exception to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement and the International Trade Agreements will apply to this solicitation. Suppliers are advised to familiarize themselves with these exceptions. The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
